Uses of Class
org.springframework.aot.hint.TypeHint.Builder

Packages that use TypeHint.Builder
Package
Description
org.springframework.aot.hint
Support for registering the need for reflection, resources, java serialization and proxies at runtime.

  • Uses of TypeHint.Builder in org.springframework.aot.hint

    Methods in org.springframework.aot.hint that return TypeHint.Builder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TypeHint.Builder
    TypeHint.Builder.onReachableType(Class<?> reachableType)
    Make this hint conditional on the fact that the specified type is in a reachable code path from a static analysis point of view.
    TypeHint.Builder
    TypeHint.Builder.onReachableType(TypeReference reachableType)
    Make this hint conditional on the fact that the specified type is in a reachable code path from a static analysis point of view.
    TypeHint.Builder
    TypeHint.Builder.withConstructor(List<TypeReference> parameterTypes, ExecutableMode mode)
    Register the need for reflection on the constructor with the specified parameter types, using the specified ExecutableMode.
    TypeHint.Builder
    TypeHint.Builder.withField(String name)
    Register the need for reflection on the field with the specified name.
    TypeHint.Builder
    TypeHint.Builder.withMembers(MemberCategory... memberCategories)
    Adds the specified member categories.
    TypeHint.Builder
    TypeHint.Builder.withMethod(String name, List<TypeReference> parameterTypes, ExecutableMode mode)
    Register the need for reflection on the method with the specified name and parameter types, using the specified ExecutableMode.

    Register or customize reflection hints for the specified type if it is available using the specified ClassLoader.
    ReflectionHints
    ReflectionHints.registerTypes(Iterable<TypeReference> types, Consumer<TypeHint.Builder> typeHint)
